video_identification.title: Palestinian Return Jewish accountability an online discussion

extracted_metadata.title: Palestinian Return Jewish accountability an online discussion
extracted_metadata.description: June 20th 2021, World Refugee Day Online panel With author Peter Beinart, Dr.Avi-ram Tzoreff & Inna Michaeli about different Jewish and Israeli communities and how they can take responsibility for the Nakba and support Palestinian right to return. Moderator: Dr. Munir Nusseibah
